messages.message:
Hi team, I'm trying to pass CI tests for a cherry pick to 25.26 from 25.28 and I'm getting a "nltk" issue as described here: https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C035SLYCJ9X/p1750652162227839
I'm not really sure how to proceed, it also seems I'm failing some unit tests? But the relevant tests I changed in the PR don't fail. This cherrypick (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/72552) needs to be merged before Monday for a customer...could I get some help here?
cc: @Anshu @Alex Sgueglia @Piyush
this is the golden preservation backport!
I have force merged it - so you should be all set :slightly_smiling_face:
thanks for helping while Serena is out! the failing CI tests are ok?

This won't make it to the customer on Monday without a recertify for which it is late now.

cc: @abhitaker

The cherry-pick needed to be merged before Wednesday morning for the customer to receive it in the upcoming Monday deployment. Since we’ve already passed that deadline, even if the backport is merged now, it will not make it to the customer’s Monday release stack.
